verbs.description: Barack Obama [V: does] not publicly criticize Donald Trump 's decisions often , it matters even more when the former president breaks his silence .
[ARG0: Barack Obama] does [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARGM-MNR: publicly] [V: criticize] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's decisions] [ARGM-TMP: often] , it matters even more when the former president breaks his silence .
Barack Obama does not publicly criticize Donald Trump 's decisions often , [ARG1: it] [V: matters] [ARGM-EXT: even more] [ARGM-TMP: when the former president breaks his silence] .
Barack Obama does not publicly criticize Donald Trump 's decisions often , it matters even more [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: the former president] [V: breaks] [ARG1: his silence] .
